page.title: 16B.K.V.CONTD/ POLICE
page.content: The winning village receives a certificate and a big sign.Warninglid and Staplefield have won three times, Slaugham has won once. {A VILLAGE POLICEMAN.} Slaugham is part of the Handcross rural beat area.This includes Slaugham,Handcross,part of Pease Pottage.The police house/station is at Handcross.This beat is part of the Haywards Heath sub division of the North division of the Sussex police.The policeman works 8 hours a day (shifts vary).He deals with accidents on the A23,sheep worrying,lost dogs,burglaries,family rows,interviewing witnesses,criminals, etc. When off duty a policeman from Dorking or Cuckfield covers the area.
